column1: TECHVENTURE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED - CAPITALIZATION TABLE
*Current value based on last funding round price of Rs. 1,000 per share (Face value Rs. 100 + Premium Rs. 900)
**Series A discussions underway at Rs. 60-75 Cr pre-money valuation
1. All shares are equity shares with equal voting rights (one share = one vote)
2. Founder shares subject to 4-year vesting with 1-year cliff as per SHA dated June 15, 2020
3. Angel investors have anti-dilution protection (weighted average) as per SHA
4. All shareholders subject to Right of First Refusal, Tag-Along, and Drag-Along provisions
5. Founders subject to 2-year lock-in from date of Angel investment (until June 15, 2022 - expired)
6. Board composition: 5 directors (2 Founder 1 nominees, 1 Founder 2 nominee, 1 Investor nominee, 1 Independent)
7. Reserved matters require 75% Investor consent as per SHA
Fully Diluted: Includes all issued shares plus all options that could be exercised
Vested: Options that the employee has earned the right to exercise
Liquidation Preference: Amount investors receive before other shareholders in exit scenarios
Anti-dilution: Protection for investors if company raises money at lower valuation
DOCUMENT PREPARED BY: XYZ & Co., Chartered Accountants
